short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view research on Semantic Scholar, the free, AI-powered academic search engine from the Allen Institute for AI (AI2).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides search and one-click navigation to the Paper Page on semanticscholar.org, where you can save the paper to your library, add it to a research feed, cite the paper, and view citations, figures, tables, code libraries, clinical trials, and more.

We are a team of researchers and engineers at AI2 building a smarter way to search and discover scientific knowledge. Share your feedback with us by emailing: integrations@semanticscholar.org 

By installing this extension you agree to the Terms of Service
(https://allenai.org/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://allenai.org/privacy-policy).
